alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 6:06AM MST until August 21 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM MST THIS MORNING FOR GILA COUNTY... At 602 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated that rain has ended in the Tonto Creek basin including the Gisela area and near Jakes Corner. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain fell earlier this morning 3 to 6 miles northeast of Gisela. Flash flooding is likely ongoing in Tonto Creek. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Gisela and Tonto Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
